title: Help me fam!!! {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}}
body: Just wondering if there's anything I could do as a dedicated Amumu main to recieve or purchase the green chroma for Amumu's infernal skin. I know I could get it off of a streamer who still had some chromas to give away but I don't think anyone would donate a chroma to an Iron 1 Amumu main.{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Partner Program Chromas (the green ones given out as codes) that are at least 6 months old will be available in the Essence Emporium for 10,000 BE so:

* Partner chroma released from January - June will be available in the End-of-year BE Emporium
* Partner chroma released from July - December will be available in the BE Emporium following midseason
